page.title: 18A day in the life of Robert
page.content: My mum wakes me up at 8 o'clock .I have breakfast consisting of toast, Weetabix ,orange juice and coffee. Then I get dressed and go to school. I usually get to school at quarter to nine we start at 9 o'clock .We have assembly, then Maths till playtime at quarter to 11.We finish play at 11 o'clock.Then we have English until 12 o'clock when we have dinner.In the afternoon I do Art and other activities such as Rounders, Cricket, etc.Then our teacher reads us a story and we go home . {Freedom}at last.We get home at 4 o'clock, I buy some sweets and a bottle of Coca Cola. We have tea, after which I make a ramp with my friend and we jump obstacles on our bicycles.I come in at 7 o'clock and watch television. I go to bed at 9 o'clock.
